name: | (Some45bucks)
description:
controls:

WASD to move around and space to prepare a bomb. Hit enter to then execute your actions. You can only do actions for as much energy you have. Placing a bomb near a RED enemy will kill it. You move before your enemies.  Enemies will spawn from the corners and sometimes drop energy boosts. You can't move past enemies blocks. get to a position where you can't move and you lose. Get a high score and...

Have Fun!!

I decided to challenge myself and make a game in one weekend. It was more like 20 hours but I learned a lot in this time. This wasn't for any game jam or anything like that I just wanted to do it. I have stuff that I wanted to put in but couldn't. I also wish I had planned it out more. 

I'm going to make a youtube video on this experience soon.

Started: 1/31/2020

Ended: 2/2/2020

Feedback is always good :)

Video I made about this thing: 

Song: In The Atmosphere -Bad Snacks - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBCI_QCAMe1hx8UNyvJlM_Q
